title: Bit from Integration With Google Ads
description: Google Ads, also known as AdWords, is a pay-per-click online advertising service created by Google. It is a platform that allows advertisers to show targeted advertisements to visitors of websites. Google uses contextual targeting, which is based on keywords and searches terms. The advertisements are text-based and can either be text ads or display ads.
